Class NumericOpenQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem

          • edu.ucla.wise.commons.NumericOpenQuestion

  • public class NumericOpenQuestion
extends OpenQuestion
    This class is a subclass of OpenQuestion and represents an numeric open ended question on the page
